summary:
The University of Texas at Austin is a large public research university in Austin, Texas. Founded in 1883, it is the biggest school in the Texas university system. With over 50,000 students, it conducts a lot of research and has many museums and libraries. 

The university's sports teams, the Texas Longhorns, have won numerous championships. Many famous people, including Nobel Prize winners and Olympic medalists, have studied or worked here.
title: University of Texas at Austin
